name: Two Buttons Left
description:
What could you do when you have only two fingers left? This is a atmospheric game that delivers the feeling.

For Ludum Dare 34!

Here is the entry: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-34/?action=preview&uid=55229

After I submit it I will make this game free to download here.

If any musician is interested in adding music to this game, please kindly contact me! Email: handazh2@gmail.com
